EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We noticed that you recently checked-out one or more of our assets, so we thought we’d check-in and offer up some additional complimentary reading materials.
Feel free to peruse at your leisure:
- Crafting Your Cloud-Native Strategy <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/crafting-your-cloud-native-strategy?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-email-q417]]> - Beyond the 12 Factor App: Exploring the DNA of Highly Scalable, Resilient Cloud Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/beyond-the-12-factor-app?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-email-q417]]> - Cloud Foundry: The Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-email-q417]]> - Running Microservices on Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/running-microservices-on-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-email-q417]]> - From Months to Hours: Accelerating Software Deployment with PCF <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/from-months-to-hours-accelerating-software-deployment-with-pcf?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-email-q417]]>
None of these strike your fancy? Check out our Resources Page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-email-q417]]> for a whole plethora of white papers, case studies, webinars, customer stories, and more. Or stay up to date with Pivotal news by subscribing to our weekly newsletter here <[[https://pivotal.io/newsletter-subscription?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-email-q417]]>.
And if you don’t want to hear from us, we understand - you can always unsubscribe from receiving these emails here <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-email-q417]]>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
